H0.text: Which disease of the central nervous system is named after the Englishman who wrote 'An Essay on the Shaking Palsy'. Huntington's

H1.text: Which disease of the central nervous system is named after the Englishman who wrote 'An Essay on the Shaking Palsy'. Alzheimer's

H2.text: Which disease of the central nervous system is named after the Englishman who wrote 'An Essay on the Shaking Palsy'. Multiple Sclerosis

H3.text: Which disease of the central nervous system is named after the Englishman who wrote 'An Essay on the Shaking Palsy'. Parkinsons

A4.text: Parkinson's disease is named after James Parkinson.

A5.text: James Parkinson wrote 'An Essay on the Shaking Palsy'.
